channel.title: Introduction on Wikimedia Style Guide
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction on Wikimedia Style Guide

item.title: Principles
item.description: When making design decisions, we need to choose among possible solutions. Design principles help to decide what to prioritize for. Our identified design principles: This is for everyone Content first Open to collaboration Trustworthy yet joyful Design for consistency They are captured below. Find further details at Design on Wikimedia Meta-Wiki. This is for everyone We aim to support a very diverse audience as a core part of our mission.

item.title: Colors
item.description: Event content I’m the colors page. Look at me!
